did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Collection includes Correspondence between Eugene B Hale, pharmacist, his wife Lela, his parents, and his sister Laura Hale Scott. Collection consists of letters to family members in Ohio, regarding their experiences as new arrivals in Arizona, and their endeavors to settle in Parker, Mesa, and Phoenix, from January, 1913-May 1913. Includes descriptions of community life, housing, and employment conditions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Letters to family members in Ohio, regarding their experiences as new arrivals in Arizona, and their endeavors to settle in Parker, Mesa, and Phoenix, from January, 1913-May, 1913. Includes descriptions of community life, housing, and employment conditions.
